workflows.title: Workflows
workflows.selectFromGrid: Select a workflow from the grid
workflows.noActivity: No activity yet. (We'll fill this when backend + run history exist.)
workflows.settingsNote: Later we can add: visibility, tags, owner, folder, etc.

nodeTooltips.delay: Wait before running the next step.
nodeTooltips.condition: Branch the workflow based on a rule.

canvas.selectNodeOrConnection: Select a node or connection to edit.
canvas.tipClickNode: Tip: click a node or a line (edge) on the canvas.
canvas.label: Label

hints.deleteExtraTrigger: Delete the extra Trigger nodes (keep only one).
hints.dragTrigger: Drag a Trigger node from the left sidebar.
hints.removeIncomingEdge: Remove any incoming edge to the Trigger.
hints.connectToFlow: Connect it to the flow, starting from the Trigger.
hints.connectIfBranch: Connect the IF output handle to a next step.
hints.connectElseBranch: Connect the ELSE output handle to a next step.
hints.fillSmsMessage: Open the SMS node and fill the Message field.
hints.setTemplateId: Open the WhatsApp node and set Template ID.
hints.fillListId: Choose 'Specific list' then fill List ID.
hints.setDelayMinutes: Set Delay minutes to a number ≥ 0.
hints.fillNotification: Fill Title or Body in the Notification node.
hints.removeCycle: Remove the connection that creates the loop.

validation.cannotConnectToSelf: Cannot connect a step to itself
validation.useIfElseOutputs: Use IF/ELSE outputs on the condition node
validation.triggerMustBeFirst: Trigger must be the first step
validation.invalidStepConnection: This step cannot connect to that step
validation.ifElseSameTarget: IF and ELSE cannot connect to the same step
validation.workflowMustHaveTrigger: Workflow must have a Trigger node.
validation.edgeMustConnectToIn: Edge must connect to target handle (in).
validation.conditionMustUseIfElse: Condition edges must use IF or ELSE handles.
validation.edgeMustConnectFromOut: Edges must connect from source handle (out).
validation.triggerNoIncomingEdges: Trigger must be the first step (no incoming edges).
validation.conditionIfNotConnected: Condition node: IF branch is not connected.
validation.conditionElseNotConnected: Condition node: ELSE branch is not connected.
validation.nodeNotReachable: This node is not reachable from the Trigger.
validation.audienceListIdRequired: Audience node: listId is required when Audience = list.
validation.smsMessageRequired: SMS node: message text is required.
validation.delayMinutesInvalid: Delay node: minutes must be a number ≥ 0.
validation.notificationContentRequired: Notification node: title or body is required.
